plurals.name: ssl_ca_cert_info_message_device_owner
plurals.item:
"%s has installed CA certificates on your device, which may allow them to monitor your device's network activity, including your usage of emails, apps, and secure websites.
For more information about these certificates, contact your IT administrator."

"%s has installed a CA certificate on your device, which may allow them to monitor your device's network activity, including your usage of emails, apps, and secure websites.
For more information about this certificate, contact your IT administrator."
